candidates.title: Async-graphql v3
Use Rust 2021 Edition
candidates.body:
Hi!
I'm adding this PR to update to using the new 2021 edition of rust.

The Cargo toml editions were all updated to 2021. And then imports for the new
prelude members (TryFrom, TryInto, FromIterator) were removed.

candidates.title: upgrade actix to a v4.0 beta.10
Add support for cbor
candidates.body:
A while back we discussed the ability to use cbor as encoding. Back then, we got that to work and used it since on our fork. I thought that we could make a PR too.

# Note

We use it to build a graphql server and haven't encountered any errors *yet*. Multipart (for the file upload extension) probably won't work just yet, because it still uses serde_json.

candidates.title: Upgrade axum integration to Axum 0.2.0
candidates.body: I'm not an experienced Rust developer yet, so this is mostly just some brute-force follow-the-compiler changes that I can build and test successfully and incorporate into a personal project with successful build and test. Please feel free to keep or discard anything you like, I just wanted to offer a starting point and volunteer to try to see it through with some guidance. I'll gladly follow any contributor guidelines you can point me to, as well.

chosen_pr.title: upgrade actix to a v4.0 beta.10

chosen_detail.title: upgrade actix to a v4.0 beta.10
